00049 enum l4_msgtag_protocol
00050 {
00051   L4_PROTO_NONE          = 0,   
00052   L4_PROTO_ALLOW_SYSCALL = 1,   
00053   L4_PROTO_PF_EXCEPTION  = 1,   
00054 
00055   L4_PROTO_IRQ           =  -1L, 
00056   L4_PROTO_PAGE_FAULT    =  -2L, 
00057   L4_PROTO_PREEMPTION    =  -3L, 
00058   L4_PROTO_SYS_EXCEPTION =  -4L, 
00059   L4_PROTO_EXCEPTION     =  -5L, 
00060   L4_PROTO_SIGMA0        =  -6L, 
00061   L4_PROTO_IO_PAGE_FAULT =  -8L, 
00062   L4_PROTO_KOBJECT       = -10L, 
00063   L4_PROTO_TASK          = -11L, 
00064   L4_PROTO_THREAD        = -12L, 
00065   L4_PROTO_LOG           = -13L, 
00066   L4_PROTO_SCHEDULER     = -14L, 
00067   L4_PROTO_FACTORY       = -15L, 
00068   L4_PROTO_VM            = -16L,
00069   L4_PROTO_SEMAPHORE     = -20L,
00070   L4_PROTO_META          = -21L,
00071 };
00072 
00073 enum L4_varg_type
00074 {
00075   L4_VARG_TYPE_NIL    = 0x00,
00076   L4_VARG_TYPE_UMWORD = 0x01,
00077   L4_VARG_TYPE_MWORD  = 0x81,
00078   L4_VARG_TYPE_STRING = 0x02,
00079   L4_VARG_TYPE_FPAGE  = 0x03,
00080 
00081   L4_VARG_TYPE_SIGN   = 0x80,
00082 };

00089 enum l4_msgtag_flags
00090 {
00091   // flags for received IPC
00096   L4_MSGTAG_ERROR        = 0x8000,
00101   L4_MSGTAG_XCPU         = 0x4000,
00102 
00103   // flags for sending IPC
00113   L4_MSGTAG_TRANSFER_FPU = 0x1000,
00122   L4_MSGTAG_SCHEDULE     = 0x2000,
00132   L4_MSGTAG_PROPAGATE    = 0x4000,
00133 
00138   L4_MSGTAG_FLAGS        = 0xf000,
00139 };
00140 
00141 
00158 typedef struct l4_msgtag_t
00159 {
00160   l4_mword_t raw;   
00161 #ifdef __cplusplus
00162 
00163   long label() const throw() { return raw >> 16; }
00165   void label(long v) throw() { raw = (raw & 0x0ffff) | (v << 16); }
00167   unsigned words() const throw() { return raw & 0x3f; }
00169   unsigned items() const throw() { return (raw >> 6) & 0x3f; }
00176   unsigned flags() const throw() { return raw & 0xf000; }
00178   bool is_page_fault() const throw() { return label() == L4_PROTO_PAGE_FAULT; }
00180   bool is_preemption() const throw() { return label() == L4_PROTO_PREEMPTION; }
00182   bool is_sys_exception() const throw() { return label() == L4_PROTO_SYS_EXCEPTION; }
00184   bool is_exception() const throw() { return label() == L4_PROTO_EXCEPTION; }
00186   bool is_sigma0() const throw() { return label() == L4_PROTO_SIGMA0; }
00188   bool is_io_page_fault() const throw() { return label() == L4_PROTO_IO_PAGE_FAULT; }
00190   unsigned has_error() const throw() { return raw & L4_MSGTAG_ERROR; }
00191 #endif
00192 } l4_msgtag_t;
00193

00207 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t l4_msgtag(long label, unsigned words, unsigned items,
00208                                 unsigned flags) L4_NOTHROW;

00319 typedef unsigned long l4_cap_idx_t;
00320 
00327 L4_INLINE unsigned l4_is_invalid_cap(l4_cap_idx_t c) L4_NOTHROW;
00328 
00335 L4_INLINE unsigned l4_is_valid_cap(l4_cap_idx_t c) L4_NOTHROW;
00336 
00344 L4_INLINE unsigned l4_capability_equal(l4_cap_idx_t c1, l4_cap_idx_t c2) L4_NOTHROW;
00345 
00346 /* ************************************************************************* */
00347 /* Implementation */
00348 
00349 L4_INLINE unsigned
00350 l4_is_invalid_cap(l4_cap_idx_t c) L4_NOTHROW
00351 { return c & L4_INVALID_CAP_BIT; }
00352 
00353 L4_INLINE unsigned
00354 l4_is_valid_cap(l4_cap_idx_t c) L4_NOTHROW
00355 { return !(c & L4_INVALID_CAP_BIT); }
00356 
00357 L4_INLINE unsigned
00358 l4_capability_equal(l4_cap_idx_t c1, l4_cap_idx_t c2) L4_NOTHROW
00359 { return (c1 >> L4_CAP_SHIFT) == (c2 >> L4_CAP_SHIFT); }
00360 
00361 
00365 L4_INLINE
00366 l4_msgtag_t l4_msgtag(long label, unsigned words, unsigned items,
00367                       unsigned flags) L4_NOTHROW
00368 {
00369   return (l4_msgtag_t){(label << 16) | (words & 0x3f) | ((items & 0x3f) << 6)
00370                        | (flags & 0xf000)};
00371 }
00372 
00373 
00374 
00375 L4_INLINE
00376 long l4_msgtag_label(l4_msgtag_t t) L4_NOTHROW
00377 { return t.raw >> 16; }
00378 
00379 L4_INLINE
00380 unsigned l4_msgtag_words(l4_msgtag_t t) L4_NOTHROW
00381 { return t.raw & 0x3f; }
00382 
00383 L4_INLINE
00384 unsigned l4_msgtag_items(l4_msgtag_t t) L4_NOTHROW
00385 { return (t.raw >> 6) & 0x3f; }
00386 
00387 L4_INLINE
00388 unsigned l4_msgtag_flags(l4_msgtag_t t) L4_NOTHROW
00389 { return t.raw & 0xf000; }
00390 
00391 
00392 L4_INLINE
00393 unsigned l4_msgtag_has_error(l4_msgtag_t t) L4_NOTHROW
00394 { return t.raw & L4_MSGTAG_ERROR; }
00395 
00396 
00397 
00398 L4_INLINE unsigned l4_msgtag_is_page_fault(l4_msgtag_t t) L4_NOTHROW
00399 { return l4_msgtag_label(t) == L4_PROTO_PAGE_FAULT; }
00400 
00401 L4_INLINE unsigned l4_msgtag_is_preemption(l4_msgtag_t t) L4_NOTHROW
00402 { return l4_msgtag_label(t) == L4_PROTO_PREEMPTION; }
00403 
00404 L4_INLINE unsigned l4_msgtag_is_sys_exception(l4_msgtag_t t) L4_NOTHROW
00405 { return l4_msgtag_label(t) == L4_PROTO_SYS_EXCEPTION; }
00406 
00407 L4_INLINE unsigned l4_msgtag_is_exception(l4_msgtag_t t) L4_NOTHROW
00408 { return l4_msgtag_label(t) == L4_PROTO_EXCEPTION; }
00409 
00410 L4_INLINE unsigned l4_msgtag_is_sigma0(l4_msgtag_t t) L4_NOTHROW
00411 { return l4_msgtag_label(t) == L4_PROTO_SIGMA0; }
00412 
00413 L4_INLINE unsigned l4_msgtag_is_io_page_fault(l4_msgtag_t t) L4_NOTHROW
00414 { return l4_msgtag_label(t) == L4_PROTO_IO_PAGE_FAULT; }
